TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataGridCell extends System.ValueType

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>可以用於搭配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>屬性來取得或設定任何儲存格的值。 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>會導致將焦點移至所指定資料格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>。
## Examples 下列範例會將指派<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>並傳回所選資料格資料行和資料列數。 中儲存的值<xref:System.Data.DataTable>也用來列印<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>物件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A>。
[!code-cpp[Classic DataGridCell Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataGridCell Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataGridCell Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Sub New (r As Integer, c As Integer)

Docs.summary: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format:
## Examples 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>並將新的執行個體設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制項。
[!code-cpp[Classic DataGridCell.DataGridCell Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell.DataGridCell Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataGridCell.DataGridCell Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell.DataGridCell Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataGridCell.DataGridCell Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell.DataGridCell Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ColumnNumber { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ColumnNumber : int with get, set

Docs.summary: 取得或設定 控制項中的資料行編號。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A>值，以指定<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>中<xref:System.Data.DataTable>聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制項。
## Examples 下列範例會將指派<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>。 中儲存的值<xref:System.Data.DataTable>傳回藉由指定<xref:System.Data.DataRow>和<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>物件透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A>屬性。
[!code-cpp[Classic DataGridCell.ColumnNumber Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell.ColumnNumber Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataGridCell.ColumnNumber Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell.ColumnNumber Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataGridCell.ColumnNumber Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell.ColumnNumber Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
